content: baby hat designed by amy thornton this hat was designed to match the round blanket to crochet by bernat design studio hook size h yarn weight 3 light definitions beg cluster ch2 yo and draw up a loop in same st as chain 2 yo and draw through 2 loops on hook twice yo and draw through all 3 loops on hook cluster yo and draw up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops on hook 3 times yo and draw through all 4 loops on hook pattern ch4 slip_stitch in 4th chain from hook to form a ring rnd1 ch2 yo and draw up a loop in same ch4 ring yo and draw through 2 loops on hook twice yo and draw through all 3 loops on hook chain 2 * yo and draw up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops on hook 3 times in ch4 ring yo and draw through all 4 loops on hook chain 2 * repeat from * to * 3 more times join with slip_stitch to top of beg cluster rnd2 slip_stitch in next ch2 space beg cluster ch2 cluster in same ch2 space as slip_stitch ch2 cluster ch2 cluster in next 4 ch2 spaces ch2 join with slip_stitch to top of beg cluster rnd3 slip_stitch in next ch2 space beg cluster ch2 cluster in same ch2 space as slip_stitch ch2 cluster in next ch2 space chain 2 * cluster ch2 cluster in next ch2 space ch2 cluster in next ch2 space ch2 * repeat from * to * 3 more times join with slip_stitch to top of beg cluster rnd4 slip_stitch in next ch2 space beg cluster ch2 cluster in same ch2 space as slip_stitch ch2 cluster in next 2 ch2 spaces chain 2 * cluster ch2 cluster in next ch2 space ch2 cluster in next 2 ch2 spaces ch2 * repeat from * to * 3 more times join with slip_stitch to top of beg cluster rnd5 slip_stitch in next ch2 space beg cluster in same ch2 space as slip_stitch ch2 * cluster in next ch2 space ch2 * repeat from * to * 18 more times join with slip_stitch to top of beg cluster 20 clusters 20 ch2 spaces rnd6 - rnd10 repeat rnd5 rnd11 ch1 single_crochet in same st as joining 5dc in next ch2 space * single_crochet on top of next cluster 5dc in next ch2 space repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off
